JOB DESCRIPTION: As a Software Engineer at Medsphere,   you ll get to:    Build features that help doctors and nurses save time and improve patient care   Focus on user experience and performance in mobile and browser environments   Design and implement major features and architectural upgrades   Continually improve development processes and tools   Work in a small team where individual contributions really matter   Be challenged; learn and grow your skill set     Ideal background and expertise:     Strong to expert-level experience with JavaScript, CSS, HTML5 for responsive, cross-platform single-page apps   In depth experience with at least one JavaScript Framework, e.g., Knockout, Vue, Angular, React   Experience with front-end build tools, e.g., Grunt, Gulp, webpack   Working knowledge of Java (or C#) development for REST services   Competence with SQL   At least 5 years of software product development experience     Plusses but not required  :    Non-relational databases   UX and graphic design   Objective C or Swift and Apple iOS build and release processes     Perks and benefits  :    Remote work opportunity   Flexible time-off plan   Flexible work hours   Health, vision, dental, 401k, and other benefits
